# R basics
## Task 1
```{r}
df <- iris
colnames(df)
```
分析可知，该数据集有五列，具体数据类型如下
```{r,echo=FALSE,collapse=TRUE}
df <- iris
class(df[1, 1])
class(df[1, 2])
class(df[1, 3])
class(df[1, 4])
class(df[1, 5])
```

## Task 2
```{r,collapse=TRUE}
library(plyr)
df <- iris
result <- ddply(df, "Species", summarise, mean = mean(Sepal.Length, na.rm = TRUE), sd = sd(Sepal.Length, na.rm = TRUE))
write.csv(result, "R basics.csv", quote = F)
```
输出文件见`R basics.csv`

## Task 3
```{r,collapse=TRUE}
df <- iris
summary(aov(df$Sepal.Width ~ df$Species, data = df))
```
